title: sadAshiva kumArA
sahitya:
sadAshiva kumArA kaN pArAi sakala lOkAdhArA shrI gauri 


anupallavi

  padAravindanE sura munivar paNiyum praNava svarUpa gajAnana nI tuNai 


caraNam    aDiyAr ninaitta varam aruLvAi kavalaiyudan iDaiyUrellAm shidharaDippAi unadu
kaDaikkaN pArvai irundAl karai kANAda kaDalum ciTrODai AgAdO gaNapatiyE
